title: A Doted Toy Boy in Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Protagonist   Demons   Forced into a Relationship   Handsome Male Lead   Mpreg   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   S*xual Abuse   Transmigration   Vampires   Wealthy Characters
author: 喵不成鱼
description:
Jiang Sheng fell from a skyscraper. He ought to be dead, but somehow his soul traveled to another world. More surprisingly, he even transmigrated to become someone who was expecting a baby.

‘What the hell? Are you kidding me? Isn’t this a male’s body? Pregnant?’

Jiang Sheng almost freaked out, but what’s even worse was that this body belonged to a surrogate “mother” and boy toy of a tycoon. Apart from that, guess what? They happened to have an identical appearance. Why?>
